scripts.generate: md-to-pdf --stylesheet 'https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/github-markdown-css/4.0.0/github-markdown.min.css' --stylesheet 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=M+PLUS+1p:wght@300&display=swap' --pdf-options '{ "format": "A4", "margin": "15mm 15mm", "displayHeaderFooter": false }' --css 'body { font-family: "M PLUS 1p", sans-serif; font-size: 14px; }' ./README.md
